amendment.description: Amendments add $4 million to the VA's "Construction, Major Projects" account for a columbarium at the National Memorial Cemetery in Arizona; and add $1.5 million for expansion of the existing National Cemetery at Mobile, Alabama.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of several amendments, offered en bloc, to increase the appropriations for Major Construction projects by $3 million; increase the appropriations for Minor Constructions projects by $1.5 million; and to reduce the appropriations for construction of state extended care facilities comensurately.

action.text: On agreeing to the Lewis (CA) amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
